short_summary: Request for Proposal for Nurses Training for Emergency Trauma Care.
description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires the services of instructors to deliver Emergncy Trauma Care (ETC) Training to nurses working in CSC institutions. The service providers must provide all the necessary training guides, equipment, and instructors for the training.
duration_in_months: Incumbency targets: August 1, 2023; Duration: 22 Months; Service availability period for all proposed Contract value: 60 months; Additional proposed Contract value Period: for defined current period 12 months and increased by 12 months each subsequent period. For Rebidding periods 12additional period;

full_summary:
# Nurses Training – Emergency Trauma Care

## Governments Tender Announcement Notification

### Reference Information
- Solicitation Number: 21801-22-0099
- Reference Number: cb-5939-93547337
- Amendment Number: 3
- Contracting Authority: Correctional Service Canada (CSC)

### Tender Details
- Tender Publication Date: May 29, 2023
- Tender Closing Date: June 30, 2023 17:00 (Pacific Time)
- Expected Contract Start Date: August 1, 2023
- Expected Contract End Date: January 31, 2025

### Bidding Process
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) tender process under the Competitive - Open Bidding procurement method. Bidders can submit their bids for the provision of Emergency Trauma Care (ETC) training services.

### Requirements
- Provide ETC training to CSC nurses in a pre-hospital setting based on a pre-hospital trauma care model.
- Certify nurses in ETC through training delivered on an as-and-when-requested basis.
- Offer backup support and resources for the delivery of ETC training.
- Develop and deliver training materials and equipment as required.
- Provide, in person, sessions with a maximum duration of eight (8) consecutive hours, inclusive of breaks. Each session will have a minimum of four (4) and a maximum of eight (8) participants.

### Contract Terms and Conditions
- The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the lowest-priced compliant bid.
- The(SCC) will then proceed with negotiating all details with the selected bidder.
- Price will be based on annex B – Base of payment.

### Tender Procedures and Documents
- Tender documents, including the solicitation notice and attached documents, can be obtained from the government's official tendering platform (Buy and Sell).
- The CSC reserves the right to negotiate the terms and conditions of the contract with the successful bidder.

### Contact Information
- Contracting Authority: Amber Hupper
- Address: 33991 Gladys Avenue, Abbotsford, BC V2S 2E8
- Phone: +1 (236) 380-1379
- Fax: +1 (604) 870-2444
- Email: [Amber.Hupper@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Amber.Hupper@csc-scc.gc.ca)

### Important Dates
- Tender Closing Date: June 30, 2023
